price: Dugumatti haala isin xiqqoo taataniin, (dirree) Badriitti Rabbiin isinii tumseera. Akka galateeffattaniif jecha Rabbiin sodaadhaa.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدۡرٖ وَأَنتُمۡ أَذِلَّةٞۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad naṣarakumu al-lahu bibadrin wa-antum adhillatun fa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tashkurūna
